publication.title: Semantic Metadata Instantiation and Consolidation within an Ontology-based Multimedia Document Management System
publication.keyword: Data Quality;Divide and Conquer;Document Management System;Information Need;Information Sources;Knowledge Modeling;Semantic Metadata;
publication.abstract: Abstract. Automated modeling of appropriate and valid document,de- scriptions is a central issue for the benet,and success of an ontology- based personal document,management,system. One of the more practi- cal problems is the deduction of knowledge from partly large but vary- ing, ambiguous, or domain specic information sources (metadata, at- tributes, features, etc.).
